Package com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElasticSearchController
    Handles all Elasticsearch commands necessary for Taskzilla Controller for packaging all the functions dealing with elastic search.
    ElasticSearchController.AddBid
    Asynchronous task for adding a bid
    ElasticSearchController.AddNotification
    Asynchronous task for adding a notification
    ElasticSearchController.AddReview
    Asynchronous task for adding a bid
    ElasticSearchController.AddTask
    Asynchronous task for adding a task
    ElasticSearchController.AddUser
    Asynchronous task for adding a user
    ElasticSearchController.GetAllTasks
    Asynchronous task for retrieving a certain number of tasks from a certain offset
    ElasticSearchController.GetBidsByTaskID  
    ElasticSearchController.GetBidsByUserID  
    ElasticSearchController.GetNotificationsByUserID
    Asynchronous task for retrieving all Notifications from a user id todo: take in size and from integer to allow pagination
    ElasticSearchController.GetReviewsByUserId  
    ElasticSearchController.GetTask
    Asynchronous task for retrieving a specific task
    ElasticSearchController.GetTasksByProviderUsername
    Asynchronous task that retrieves tasks from a provider username
    ElasticSearchController.GetTasksByRequesterUsername
    Asynchronous task that retrieves tasks from a requester username
    ElasticSearchController.GetUser
    Asynchronous task for retrieving a user
    ElasticSearchController.GetUserByUsername
    Asynchronous task for retrieving a user by username
    ElasticSearchController.RemoveBid
    Asynchronous task that removes a bid todo: make this take in a bid id
    ElasticSearchController.RemoveNotification  
    ElasticSearchController.RemoveTask
    Asynchronous task for removing a task
    ElasticSearchController.RemoveUser
    Asynchronous task for removing a user
    ElasticSearchController.SearchForTasks
    Asynchronous task that searches for a certain number of tasks from a certain offset that match a given keyword in the description
    ElasticSearchController.UpdateTask
    Asynchronous task for updating a task
    ElasticSearchController.UpdateUser
    Asynchronous task for updating a user
    GetBidByUserIdController
    Get bids by user id controller
    MainActivityController
    Controller that handles login and signup functionality in the main activity
    NewTaskController
    Controller for creating a new task
    NotificationsController
    Controller that handles interaction between the NotificationFragment and elasticsearch.
    ProfileController
    Controller for pro
    SearchController
    Controller that deals with the backend stuff related to the screen.
    ViewTaskController
    Controller for ViewTaskActivity
